mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (first_name, mid_name, last_name, email, date_of_birth, address, city, province, country, postal_code, password, id_role) VALUES (#{firstName}, #{midName}, #{lastName}, #{email}, #{dateOfBirth}, #{address}, #{city}, #{province}, #{country}, #{postalCode}, #{password}, #{idRole})
mapper.select: SELECT id AS id, first_name AS firstName, mid_name AS midName, last_name AS lastName, email AS email, date_of_birth AS dateOfBirth, address AS address, city AS city, province AS province, country AS country, postal_code AS postalCode, id_role AS idRole FROM user WHERE email = #{email} AND password = #{password} AND id_role = #{idRole}
SELECT id AS id, role_name AS roleName FROM role
